title: Quality of care after a horizontal merger between two large academic hospitals
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Ilse J.A. Wissink, Michiel Schinkel, Hessel Peters-Sengers, Simon A. Jones, Alexander P.J. Vlaar, Karen J. Kruijthof, W. Joost Wiersinga
